bibl.title: Hadrian’s Serapeum in Rome
bibl.note: See esp. pp. 251-254: Hadrian's motive and his journey in Egypt. The new Serapeum in Rome was conceived as a votive temple for the conclusion of the Jewish Revolt that had jeopardized the Egyptian harvest and its transport to Rome.
bibl.seg: TAYLOR Rabun, Hadrian's Serapeum in Rome. Avec résumé en anglais.

See esp. pp. 251-254: Hadrian's motive and his journey in Egypt. The new Serapeum in Rome was conceived as a votive temple for the conclusion of the Jewish Revolt that had jeopardized the Egyptian harvest and its transport to Rome.
